message.body: Just checkin' in. Are we still bed bug bite free?
Yeah!!!
Hahaha yesssss
ï¿¼Also I've been gallery sitting and it's been so fun
My life is so much better AND
I have a huge sunflower head w seeds- want me to plant sunflowers in front yard? It looks easy and they're annuals and I bet it'll be pretty against the porch
Awesome!! I hope you don't mind me checking in on an almost daily basis. I want to make sure those suckers are GONE!
It's best to plant may/June but according to the internet now would prob work too
Omg no I don't mind- I was going to redry everything tonight just be extra extra sure
Bc it's been so nice not getting bit
That's funny. Jo loves Sunflowers. She used to plant them back home & has planted them here too.
Yeah. I can only imagine.
Sunflowers?
Ha!! They're just very 'west Philly
In a good way
Yeah
Many of the houses on Chester have sunflowers in their yards
So they seem to thrive here?
Yeah I have noticed that. One of the things I love about WP is some of the gardens are spectacular. How long do you think it will take to plant?
There is a bunch of things I'd like to get done over there but I'm on a bit of a shoe string budget with all the roofing / exterminator bills.
There should be a few baga of garden soil in the backyard. And there should be a spade in the tool closet. Is there anything else that you need?
Oh haha nah id do it for free duh
Sounds good!
I want to pay you for your time. Just want to figure out what I can get done this month.
David got bit again last night. Cindy is coming back tomorrow afternoon. Did you notice any new bites?
